Class ValueGrabber<ValueType>

A ValueGrabber extracts a single or list of values from Cheerio HTML node by traversing it.

Type parameters

  • ValueType

Hierarchy

  • ValueGrabber

Implements

  • ValueGrabberConfig<ValueType>
  • IValueGrabber<ValueType>

Constructors

constructor

  • new ValueGrabber(shortHandle: string, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string, mapper?: Mapper<ValueType>): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(config: ValueGrabberConfig<ValueType>, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string, fallbackMapper?: Mapper<ValueType>): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(grabFn: ValueGrabberFunction<ValueType>, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(config: ValueGrabber<ValueType>, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(undefinedConfig: undefined, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string, mapper?: Mapper<ValueType>): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(nullConfig: null, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string, mapper?: Mapper<ValueType>): ValueGrabber
  • new ValueGrabber(any: any, logger?: Logger, logPrefix?: string, mapper?: Mapper<ValueType>): ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber from the short handle notation.

    Parameters

    • shortHandle: string

      The short handle string

    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    • Optional mapper: Mapper<ValueType>

      A mapper function to map or enrich the grabbed raw value

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber from a config object.

    Parameters

    • config: ValueGrabberConfig<ValueType>

      The config to create the ValueGrabber from

    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    • Optional fallbackMapper: Mapper<ValueType>

      A mapper function, which will be used if the configs does not provide one

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber from a custom value grabbing function. The function will be called with two arguments: the Cheerio Box and the current Context. It must return the grabbed value or values.

    Parameters

    • grabFn: ValueGrabberFunction<ValueType>

      The custom value grabbing function.

    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber from an existing ValueGrabber instance by using the same confuration.

    Parameters

    • config: ValueGrabber<ValueType>

      The config to create the ValueGrabber from

    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber which will always grab null

    Parameters

    • undefinedConfig: undefined
    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    • Optional mapper: Mapper<ValueType>

      A mapper function to map or enrich the grabbed raw value

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Creates a new ValueGrabber which will always grab null

    Parameters

    • nullConfig: null
    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    • Optional mapper: Mapper<ValueType>

      A mapper function to map or enrich the grabbed raw value

    Returns ValueGrabber

  • Framework internal overload to overcome typescript errors.

    internal

    Parameters

    • any: any
    • Optional logger: Logger

      Logger for debugs, defaults to no logs

    • Optional logPrefix: string

      The prefix string to build the debug log namespace

    • Optional mapper: Mapper<ValueType>

      A mapper function to map or enrich the grabbed raw value

    Returns ValueGrabber

Methods

grab

  • grab(container: Cheerio, context?: ParsingContext): ValueType | ValueType[]

  • Implementation of IValueGrabber.grab

    Grabs matching values form within a given container node and it's children nodes.

    Parameters

    • container: Cheerio

      A cheerio container or box to search a value in.

    • Default value context: ParsingContext = null

    Returns ValueType | ValueType[]

    the grabbed value if only one found, an array of the values when multiple found or null if none found.

grabAll

  • grabAll(container: Cheerio, context?: ParsingContext): ValueType[]

  • Grabs all matching values form within a given container node and it's children nodes.

    Parameters

    • container: Cheerio

      A cheerio container or box to search a value in.

    • Default value context: ParsingContext = null

    Returns ValueType[]

    An array of the values that where found.

grabFirst

  • grabFirst(container: Cheerio, context?: ParsingContext): ValueType

  • Grabs the first matching value form within a given container node and it's children nodes.

    Parameters

    • container: Cheerio

      A cheerio container or box to search a value in.

    • Default value context: ParsingContext = null

    Returns ValueType

    the first value that was found or null if none
